title: Indoor Spa, Sundeck/Lounge Area, Outside Storage Closet, Valet Trash
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 904 Sq.
Alderwood Park offers 1 and 2 bedroom apartments with wood burning fireplaces, washers/dryers and private outdoor spaces in Lynnwood, WA.
We're just 1 block from the Alderwood Mall and 1 mile from I-5 and I-405 for easy access to shopping, dining, entertainment and the area's major employers including Boeing.
We invite you to visit us today and take a tour of our scenic community that includes a heated outdoor pool, spa, off-leash dog park and playground.
Our on-site management and leasing team would be happy to show you around and share the Alderwood Park Lifestyle experience.
Come see what we have to offer you in an apartment home!

Outside Storage Closet, Cable/ Internet Ready, Wood Burning Fireplace, Valet Trash, Private Patio, Washer/Dryer Included, Full Interior Renovations, Private Balcony, Dishwasher, Individual Climate Control, Garbage Disposal
